column2: the wine list recovered the barman's slip on the Negroni because every single variation you would prefer on the red wine-steak pairing was present.  If you wanted to go big with a cabernet or Bordeaux
column3: then go for it.  If you wanted a Gigondas/Cotes du Rhone/Chateneuf du Pape middle ground
column4: you could support your steak rather than compete with it.  Finally
column5: if you wanted a Pinot Noir or some other little Nancy wine
column6: then the night was still yours.
